name: Formula X
description: 3D racing game with battle elements, top-down camera style similar to genesis (mega drive) titles and super nintendo, lots of speed action in a frantic race!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7, windows 8 , windows 10 Processor: 64 bit - 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Onboard Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7, windows 8 , windows 10 Processor: 64 bit - 1.2 GHz processor or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb or higher video card Storage: 1300 MB available space
